Address.label: Address
Address.value: 121 SEAPORT BOULEVARD, BOSTON, Massachusetts, 02210, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: PTC offers high-end computer-assisted design (Creo) and product lifecycle management (Windchill) software as well as Internet of Things and AR industrial solutions. Founded in 1985, PTC has 28,000 customers, with revenue stemming mostly from North America (45%) and Europe (40%).
